definition: to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 棄置大件玻璃利器時，請通知當值職員協助妥善處理。

sentences.english: Chapter 5, It is mainly about accounting standards on dumping fees in oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，主要是石油天然氣會計即對棄置費用的研究。

sentences.english: They also must clear the stadium of asbestos — a potentially deadly killer if left uncontained.
sentences.chinese: 他們還得清除體育場的石棉，一旦任意棄置可能致命。

sentences.english: In this derelict eastern area, there are still a few die-hards who refuse to move.
sentences.chinese: 東邊被棄置的地方，仍舊有少數一些人拒絕搬遷。

sentences.english: But the first thing we need to do is to let go our own definition of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 但我們首先要做的是將自己對幸福的定義棄置不顧。

sentences.english: The future history books might also record that we were deprived of the use of our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 未來的歷史書還會記載說，我們的眼睛也棄置不用了。

sentences.english: The future history books might record that we were deprived of the use of our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 未來的歷史書還會記載說，我們的眼睛也棄置不用了。

sentences.english: Discard cans that bulge at the ends or that are leaking.
sentences.chinese: 棄置脹罐或滲漏的罐頭。

sentences.english: The first internal combustion engines ran on the previously discarded gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 早期的內燃機使用原先棄置不用的汽油運轉。

sentences.english: Obviously the place hadn't seen much use lately.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，這房間已經棄置不用多時了。

sentences.english: Wll leave aside the problem of agency until next week.
sentences.chinese: 我們且則把代辦署理問題棄置到下週。

sentences.english: Please dispose all garbage into the garbage bin which placed inside the pantry.
sentences.chinese: 請將垃圾棄置於茶水間垃圾桶內。

sentences.english: The spoon has been rusty from disuse.
sentences.chinese: 湯匙因棄置不用而生鏽了。

sentences.english: Being laid aside so long, it will take me some time to recall the sensation of English.
sentences.chinese: 我的英語多年棄置不用，拾起來也需要一定時間。

sentences.english: This theory had lay dormant for about 40 years, though, without any supporting evidence.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒有確鑿的證據，這個理論被棄置了大約40年。

definition: public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
